title: Ratticus
description: One Man. One Rat. One Of Them MUST Die!The true story of one family, one critter, and one month's worth of problems.A comedic look at the travails of being a homeowner and dealing with the occasional uninvited house guest.Check out our interactive blog website where you can weigh in on the story, see actual pictures of the “critter” in question, and leave your own “Critter Gone Wild” stories.First sales proceeds to be "donated" to our local appliance store since our critter ATE our dishwasher. You've GOT to see those pictures - unbelievable!
author: Raymond Birdsell
